all_findings.title: Missing nonReentrant Modifier on safeTransferFrom()
all_findings.description: Function makes external calls or transfers ETH but lacks nonReentrant modifier. External calls: 0, ETH transfers: 0. This function should have reentrancy protection.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add `nonReentrant` modifier from OpenZeppelin's ReentrancyGuard. Import: `import '@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol';` Usage: `function safeTransferFrom(...) external nonReentrant { ... }`

attack_vectors.description: Reentrancy vulnerability combined with fund transfer

all_findings.title: Missing nonReentrant Modifier on safeBatchTransferFrom()
all_findings.description: Function makes external calls or transfers ETH but lacks nonReentrant modifier. External calls: 0, ETH transfers: 0. This function should have reentrancy protection.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add `nonReentrant` modifier from OpenZeppelin's ReentrancyGuard. Import: `import '@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol';` Usage: `function safeBatchTransferFrom(...) external nonReentrant { ... }`

attack_vectors.description: Reentrancy vulnerability combined with fund transfer

evidence.gas_saved: ~50 gas per call, significant deployment savings

all_fixes.explanation: Cache ids.length before loop (saves ~3 gas per iteration)
Cache owners.length before loop (saves ~3 gas per iteration)
Added onlyOwner modifier to critical function
all_fixes.diff:
--- original
+++ fixed
@@ -1 +1 @@
- function setApprovalForAll(address operator, bool approved) public virtual 
+ function setApprovalForAll(address operator, bool approved) public onlyOwner virtual
